original_text: And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another, and from one sabbath to another, shall all flesh come to worship before me, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와가 말하노라 매월 초하루와 매 안식일에 모든 혈육이 내 앞에 나아와 예배하리라

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass,
that from one new moon to another,
and from one sabbath to another,
shall all flesh come to worship before me,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 육체가 내 앞에 경배하러 올 것이며,
